EmailTemplate.subject: How Will You Meet Black Friday Web Demand?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/solutions/use-cases/maintain-web-application-performance-demand-peaks?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ecommerceEbook&utm_content=06032015> {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, When it comes to consumer goods and services, online shopping is many people’s drink of choice. With online shopping as standard, companies that don’t have a strong online presence or have pages with poor application performance will surely lose patrons to the competition. In fact, an online shopper is 40% more likely to leave a site for another if page load time is greater than 2 seconds. During the busy holiday season this 40% can add up to big losses in revenue.
Find out how to prevent these losses in our latest whitepaper; Empowering e-Commerce Against Unpredictable Demand. <http://vmturbo.com/solutions/use-cases/maintain-web-application-performance-demand-peaks?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ecommerceEbook&utm_content=06032015> After reading this whitepaper you’ll know:
- Common challenges facing E-commerce platforms and B2C website managers preparing for the holiday shopping rush. - Managing the tradeoffs between application, compute and storage resources, as well as network latency, across the virtual or cloud environment. - VMTurbo’s unique approach to addressing Quality of Service adherence, assuring application performance and providing users with peace of mind.
- The VMTurbo Team <http://vmturbo.com/solutions/use-cases/maintain-web-application-performance-demand-peaks?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ecommerceEbook&utm_content=06032015>
